cause.description:
Declaration of Conscience

Whereas a native population of thirty to forty million Kurds still lives in their ancestral homeland known as Kurdistan, approximating the size of Texas or France, situated in the heart of the Middle East, as attested by impartial historians and geographers of the world;

Whereas the Kurds and Kurdistan, once partitioned and administered by the comparatively benign rulers of the Ottoman and Persian Empires under policies respecting Kurdish linguistic and cultural rights, became the spoils of war in the course of the World War I and were partitioned again by the British, French, and Russian colonialists, placing them at the mercy of these powers and of the predatory modern nationalisms of the Turks and the Persians;

Read our full declaration of conscience at http://kurdistan.org/petition/declaration.html

Please join our facebook group to keep up to date with this cause. 1. We subscribe to the principle of self-determination for all the peoples of the world 2. We reject the domination of one race over the other or the strong over the weak
cause.mission: is to RIGHT a wrong, to GIVE BACK a people their voice, and to SERVE truth by calling a land with its proper name, KURDISTAN! If you value your FREEDOM this cause is for YOU! visit kurdistan.org!!!
